Package io.github.zero88.jooqx.datatype

Interface JooqxConverter<V,J>

Type Parameters:
V - The Vertx data type as database data type
J - The jOOQ data type as an intermediate type is used in jOOQ record
All Superinterfaces:
BridgeConverter<V,J>, org.jooq.ContextConverter<V,J>, org.jooq.Converter<V,J>, ConverterRepr<V,J>, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
UserTypeAsVertxType<V,J>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BigDecimalConverter, BytesConverter, IntervalConverter, JsonArrayJSONBConverter, JsonArrayJSONConverter, JsonObjectJSONBConverter, JsonObjectJSONConverter
public interface JooqxConverter<V,J> extends BridgeConverter<V,J>, ConverterRepr<V,J>
Defines basic datatype converter between Vert.x datatype as database data type and jOOQ SQL data type as an intermediate type is used in jOOQ record

In the specified database, depends on Vertx. SQL client, we will have a list of particular jOOQ.x converter. See spi modules depends on database for more information

See Also:
  • SQLDataType
  • Converter
